item.description:
Daylight savings!! Don't forget to change your clocks the night before this walk!

Brook Farm Historic Site
Enter at 670 Baker Street, 1/3 mile north of VFW Parkway

This National Historic Landmark is 179 acres of rolling fields, woodland and wetland and was the location of the experimental society of Transcendentalists who lived on the farm in the 1840's.

The trails begin near Gesthemane Cemetery and connect to the Charles River Trail and Millenium Park. I think boots will be a good idea for this walk.

Here is a link to a trail map. We will meet in the parking lot by the cemetery offices.
http://www.newtoncons...

If you need a ride please say so in your rsvp, along with what neighborhood you are in.

Afterwards we will go for lunch at Fresh City.

241 Needham Street
Newton, MA 02464
Phone (617) 244-7071

Hours: Mon-Fri 6:30am-9:00pm; Sat/Sun10:00am-9:00pm
From Rte. 128/Rte. 95 either direction, take EXIT 19A "Needham Street/Newton Highlands." Follow Highland Ave. for approximately 1 mile. Fresh City is on the left in the Marshall's Plaza, across from Linens 'n Things
http://www.freshcity....
item.name: Brook Farm Historic Site walk
